import React from"react";import{useRecoilValue}from'recoil';import WarningState from'../recoilStates/WarningState';import RoadNameState from'../recoilStates/RoadNameState';import FeatureState from'../recoilStates/FeatureState';import InfraListState from'../recoilStates/InfraListState';import SupportInfraListState from'../recoilStates/SupportInfraListState';import AroundEnvListState from'../recoilStates/AroundEnvListState';import AddressState from'../recoilStates/AddressState';import AroundSubwayState from'../recoilStates/AroundSubwayState';import firebase from'global/fbase';var SetEntireStates=function SetEntireStates(){var warning=useRecoilValue(WarningState);var roadName=useRecoilValue(RoadNameState);var feature=useRecoilValue(FeatureState);var infraList=useRecoilValue(InfraListState);var supportInfraList=useRecoilValue(SupportInfraListState);var aroundEnvList=useRecoilValue(AroundEnvListState);var address=useRecoilValue(AddressState);var aroundSubway=useRecoilValue(AroundSubwayState);var userUid=firebase.auth().currentUser.uid;var EntireState={roadName:roadName,warning:warning,feature:feature,infraList:infraList,supportInfraList:supportInfraList,aroundEnvList:aroundEnvList,address:address,aroundSubway:aroundSubway,user:userUid};return EntireState;};export default SetEntireStates;
